response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I think it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $120 for the product. This offers you a significant discount compared to the market value of $150, while still allowing me to earn a fair profit. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 120}
